definition: to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate

sentences.english: Jump rope for two-minute intervals. Repeat four times.
They can also play skip rope and hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 孩子还可以玩跳绳和捉迷藏。

sentences.english: Sportss festival this year I participated in the rope skipping.
sentences.chinese: 今年体育节我还是参加了跳绳的比赛。

sentences.english: Kim jumps the rope again and again.
Children jump rope, Tongxin County, Ningxia, China.
sentences.chinese: 在宁夏同心县，孩子们在进行跳绳运动。

sentences.english: “When’s the last time most adults jumped rope?” Ms. Calabrese asked.
sentences.chinese: 什么时候大多数成年人跳绳？

sentences.english: We kick shuttlecocks , jump rope and play finger games.
sentences.chinese: 我们打羽毛球，跳绳和玩手指游戏。

sentences.english: Jamahl's playing jump rope with Jasmine and Jack.
sentences.chinese: 贾马尔同茉莉和杰克一起跳绳。

sentences.english: Rollerblade, hit a ball , swim , jump rope , fly a kite , ride a bike. ,
sentences.chinese: 溜旱冰，打球，游泳，跳绳，放风筝，骑自行车。

sentences.english: They skip rope and play table tennis with paddles made from floor tiles.
sentences.chinese: 他们跳绳，用天花板制成的拍子玩乒乓。

sentences.english: I do lots of jumping rope for about a month and a half before the show.
sentences.chinese: 在维密秀开演之前我会花一个半月的时间大量地跳绳。

sentences.english: Examples are bicycle-riding, jumping rope, walking, jogging, aerobic dance, and swimming.
sentences.chinese: 例如骑自行车，跳绳，快走，慢跑，有氧舞蹈和游泳。

sentences.english: Jumping rope is a plyometric style workout.
You could even incorporate it into jumping rope or a sport like racquetball.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以用跳绳和手球式壁球来组合。

sentences.english: We kick shuttlecocks, rope and play finger games.
sentences.chinese: 我们打羽毛球，跳绳和玩手指游戏。

sentences.english: During the class activity to be active, kicking shuttlecock skipping a strong body.
sentences.chinese: 课间活动要活跃，踢毽跳绳强健体。

definition: to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
